newsitem.title: USA: Texas Gas files shelf for $200 mln in debt.
newsitem.headline: Texas Gas files shelf for $200 mln in debt.

text.p: Texas Gas Transmission Corp, a unit of The Williams Cos, filed Monday with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to $200 million in debt securities.
Net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including repayment of outstanding debt, the company said in the filing.

Texas Gas, based in Owensburo, Kentucky, is an interstate natural gas transmission company that owns and operates a natural gas pipleline system originating in the Louisiana Gulf Coast area and in East Texas.
